Posts.Content: Also had pain in right breast. Had annual mammogram 11/12. Pain started 3/13. Finally convinced Dr. I needed another mammogram. Results came back that they want another mamm in 6 months to make sure an area in right breast is normal. What is this supposed to mean and why wait if something is suspicious. After I speak to my dr. I'm going to seek another opinion. I'm 75yrs. and my mom died of breast cancer at 42yrs. so I'm high risk
Posts.Title: Pain in The right breast
